select
,
from devices
Id like "%"#{searchPhrase, jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or TVName like "%"#{searchPhrase, jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or TVModelNumber like "%"#{searchPhrase, jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or TVRoomID like "%"#{searchPhrase, jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or TVMACAddress like "%"#{searchPhrase, jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" or Type like "%"#{searchPhrase, jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
Id ${IdSort},
TVName ${TvNameSort},
TVIPAddress ${TVIPAddressSort},
TVRoomID ${TVRoomIDSort},
TVMACAddress ${TVMACAddressSort},
Type ${TypeSort},
limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{rowCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}
